overview: Camilo is a boy who comes from an upper-class family. His father is a lawyer, upright and conservative. His mother is a young woman, an inactive psychologist, and a homemaker. Camilo and Elena experience physical and psychological abuse from Mario, who controls all their actions. Camilo is facing a gender identity search, where he begins to discover and perform certain actions that make him feel and look different from others, and it is then when he begins to feel rejection primarily from his father and his peers. Camilo finds refuge in Elena, who becomes his accomplice in his search. After beatings, insults, rejection, Camilo falls into a depression that leads him to consider making incorrect decisions, to end dealing with a homophobic world.
title: Soy Elisa
